equation:
\begin{equation}%7
\frac{dS_k}{du} - \frac{k\beta_0}{1-\beta_0 u} S_k = \frac{(1-
\delta_{k,1})}{1-\beta_0 u} \sum_{\ell = 1}^{k-1} \beta_\ell \left( u
\frac{d}{du} + k - \ell \right) S_{k-\ell} (u), \; \; S_n(0)=T_{n,0}.
\
